DzFileIOSettings Class Reference
[File Input and Output]

Base class for all file I/O options. File I/O classes should use this to pass the options supported by the class. More...

#include <dzfileiosettings.h>

Inheritance diagram for DzFileIOSettings:

List of all members.

Public Functions

 DzFileIOSettings ()
 ~DzFileIOSettings ()

Detailed Description

Base class for all file I/O options. File I/O classes should use this to pass the options supported by the class.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation
